Reviews.Title: “Hard to value this hotel..”
Reviews.Author: LuMartini
Reviews.Content: hotel nice inside course clean modern 3 standards i´ve seen that´s value features hotel 455 starts location don´t car spent minimally 3 hours day traveling city that´s ok counted worse restaurants bars pizza fastfood untill 9 pm approximately 5 minutes walk booked hotel checked reviews saying noise airport true upper floor didn´t mind windows closed noise terrible 2 days game 16 night breakfast day awesome bacon eggs sausages ham cheese sweet cakes cereals etc etc fantastic day ham cheese sweet cakes eaten tryed wake third day terrible sweets bread ham maybe low budget week don´t ok 3 standard bed 2 slept beds bed approx 140 cm pillows changed hotel bad hotel price count lot travelling noise poor breakfast third time rome time somwhere else money

HotelInfo.Name: Meeting Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Via Pier Vittorio Aldini 38/a, 00178 Rome, Italy
